name: leafless
description:
you play a shadowy character with a leaf on his back. Equipped with a thorn as weapon you can explore the few levels i made and fight/interact with the creatures that you'll find there.  I hope you enjoy!

In case you want to speedrun:

there are two speed run categories:

  • speed run with wall jumps
  • speed run without wall jumps

you can enable or disable the wall jumps in the main menu, if you want to start a new attempt you should press restart because start will continue your previous run. 

good luck!

notes:
  • new rooms are indicated with a bright green rectangle
  • if you fall out the map, pressing n should fix this
controles: move leftleft_arrowmove rightright arrowjump/wall jumpspaceinteract with npciopen chestapauseescmanually to next leveln
